loop3.caption:
Which of the following statements best describes the execution of the while loop? Give the answer at the bottom of the page.

I) When j is less than 10, print "Book i", e.g.,

Book 1

Book 2

...

Book 9

II) When j is less than 10, print "Book j", e.g.,

Book 0

Book 1

...

Book 9

III) j is always equal to 0, which is less than 10; so print "Book 0" an infinite number of times, e.g.,

Book 0

Book 0

...

IV) j is always equal to 0, which is less than 10; so print "Book i" an infinite number of times, e.g.

Book 1

Book 2

...

V) j is equal to 0, which is less than 10; so print

Book 1
